verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to her that is <S%H4754>filthy<s%> and <S%H1351>polluted<s%>, to the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>!

She <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%>; she <S%H3947>received<s%> not <S%H4148>correction<s%>; she <S%H982>trusted<s%> not in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; she drew not <S%H7126>near<s%> to her <S%H430>God<s%>.

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7130>inside<s%> her are <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%>; her <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves<s%>; they gnaw and break the <S%H1633>bones<s%> until the <S%H1242>morrow<s%>.

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H6348>light<s%> and <S%H900>treacherous<s%> <S%H582>persons<s%>: her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, they have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

The <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>; he will not do <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>: <S%H1242>every<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> does he <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%>, he <S%H5737>fails<s%> <S%H5767>not<s%>; but the unjust <S%H3045>knows<s%> no <S%H1322>shame<s%>.

I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: their <S%H6438>towers<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; I made their <S%H2351>streets<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%>, that no one passes <S%H5674>by<s%>: their <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6658>destroyed<s%>, so that there is no <S%H376>man<s%>, that there is no <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely you will <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3947>me<s%>, you will receive <S%H4148>instruction<s%>; so their <S%H4583>living<s%> should not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, <S%H834>howsoever<s%> I <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H403>them<s%>: but they rose <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> all their <S%H5949>doings<s%>.

Therefore <S%H2442>wait<s%> upon <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H5706>prey<s%>: for my <S%H4941>determination<s%> is to <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, that I may <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, to <S%H8210>pour<s%> upon them my <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, even all my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>: for all the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.

For then will I <S%H2015>return<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1305>pure<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%>, that they may all <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>consent<s%>.

From <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> my <S%H6282>suppliants<s%>, even the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H6327>dispersed<s%>, shall <S%H2986>bring<s%> my <S%H4503>offering<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall you not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for all your <S%H5949>doings<s%>, where you have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H5493>me<s%>: for then I will take away out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you them that <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H1346>pride<s%>, and you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H1361>haughty<s%> because of my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

I will also <S%H7604>leave<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you an <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, nor <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>; neither shall a <S%H8649>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> and lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; <S%H7321>shout<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> with all the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has taken <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, he has cast <S%H6437>out<s%> your <S%H341>enemy<s%>: the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7200>you<s%>: you shall not see evil any <S%H7451>more<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> you <S%H6726>not<s%>: and to Zion, Let not your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7503>slack<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you is <S%H1368>mighty<s%>; he will <S%H3467>save<s%>, he will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over you with <S%H8057>joy<s%>; he will <S%H2790>rest<s%> in his <S%H160>love<s%>, he will <S%H1523>joy<s%> over you with <S%H7440>singing<s%>.
I will <S%H622>gather<s%> them that are <S%H3013>sorrowful<s%> for the solemn <S%H4150>assembly<s%>, who are of <S%H2781>you<s%>, to whom the reproach of it was a <S%H4864>burden<s%>.

<S%H6256>Behold<s%>, at that time I will <S%H6213>undo<s%> all that <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3467>you<s%>: and I will save her that <S%H6760>limps<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> her that was driven <S%H5080>out<s%>; and I will <S%H7760>get<s%> them <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H8034>fame<s%> in every <S%H776>land<s%> where they have been put to <S%H1322>shame<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H6256>again<s%>, even in the time that I <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>: for I will make you a <S%H8034>name<s%> and a <S%H8416>praise<s%> among all <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, when I turn <S%H7725>back<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
